rules_text:
Interplanar Observer can’t be blocked as long as it’s attacking alone.
Whenever Interplanar Observer attacks, roll the planar die.
Whenever chaos ensues [i](you roll {A})[/i], you may exile Interplanar Observer. If you do, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards.
notes:
Inspiration — Alien robot from another world

Mechanical Uniqueness — Planar dice mechanics in non-planechase format
